MATCH (u1:user {domain: $result})-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) WHERE (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-512") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-516") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-518") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-519") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-520") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-544") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-548") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-549") OR (n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-551") WITH COLLECT(u1) AS exclude MATCH p = (u2:User)-[r:AddMember|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|AllExtendedRights|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|Owns]->(g:GPO) WHERE NOT u2 IN exclude RETURN p

queries.name: Set DCSync Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChanges*1..]->(d:Domain) WITH s, d MATCH (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChangesAll*1..]->(d) WITH s, d MATCH p = (s)-[r:MemberOf|GetChanges|GetChangesAll*1..]->(d) WHERE s.highvalue = false SET s.highvalue = true, s.highvaluereason = 'DCSync Principal' RETURN p

queries.name: Set Unconstrained Delegation Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(uc) WHERE (uc:User OR uc:Computer) AND uc.unconstraineddelegation = true AND uc.highvalue = false SET uc.highvalue = true, uc.highvaluereason = 'Unconstrained Delegation Principal' RETURN p

queries.name: Set Local Admin or Reset Password Principals as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:AdminTo|ForceChangePassword]->(b) WHERE a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Local Admin or Reset Password Principal' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Principals with Privileges on Computers as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:AllowedToDelegate|ExecuteDCOM|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(n:Computer) WHERE a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Principal with Privileges on Computers' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Principals with Privileges on Cert Publishers as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|MemberOf|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ 'S-1-5-21-.*-517' AND a.highvalue = false SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Principal with Privileges on the Cert Publisher group' RETURN a

queries.name: Set Members of High Value Targets Groups as High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (a)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE a.highvalue = false AND g.highvalue = true SET a.highvalue = true, a.highvaluereason = 'Member of High Value Target Group' RETURN a

queries.name: Remove Inactive Users and Computers from High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (uc) WHERE uc.highvalue = true AND ((uc:User AND uc.enabled = false) OR (uc:Computer AND ((uc.enabled = false) OR (uc.lastlogon > 0 AND uc.lastlogon < (TIMESTAMP() / 1000 - 15552000)) OR (uc.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND uc.lastlogontimestamp < (TIMESTAMP() / 1000 - 15552000))))) SET uc.highvalue = false, uc.nothighvaluereason = 'Inactive' RETURN uc

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC2)

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Enrollment Agent Templates from Owned Principals (ESC3)

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') return p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with User Specified SAN (ESC6)

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with HTTP Web Enrollment (ESC8)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`Web Enrollment` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and 'NoSecurityExtension' in n.`Enrollment Flag` and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unsecured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC9)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and g<>n and 'NoSecurityExtension' in n.`Enrollment Flag` and n.`Enabled` = true and NONE(rel in r WHERE type(rel) in ['EnabledBy','Read','ManageCa','ManageCertificates']) return p

MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set less than 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.hasspn=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) AND NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u.name, u.pwdlastset order by u.pwdlastset

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable Users with a path to DA

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(g) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Find machines Domain Users can RDP into

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' return p
MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:CanRDP]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users that have local admin rights

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all active Domain Admin sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(n) return p

queries.name: Find all computers with Unconstrained Delegation

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) return c

queries.name: Find all computers with unsupported operating systems

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem = '.*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find users that logged in within the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find users with passwords last set within the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u
MATCH p=(u:User)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find computers that allow unconstrained delegation that AREN’T domain controllers.

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: Return the name of every computer in the database where at least one SPN for the computer contains the string 'MSSQL'

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE toUpper(x) CONTAINS 'MSSQL') RETURN c
Match (n:GPO) RETURN n

queries.name: View all groups that contain the word 'admin'

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Find users that can be AS-REP roasted

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set > 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE n.hasspn=true AND WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Show all high value target's groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that contain both users and computers

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable users who are members of high value groups

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND u.hasspn=true RETURN u

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable users and where they are AdminTo

queryList.query: OPTIONAL MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.hasspn=true OPTIONAL MATCH (u1)-[r:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN u

queries.name: Find computers with constrained delegation permissions and the corresponding targets where they allowed to delegate

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.allowedtodelegate IS NOT NULL RETURN c

queries.name: Find if any domain user has interesting permissions against a GPO (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' return p

queries.name: Find users that have never logged on and account is still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Find an object in one domain that can do something to a foreign object

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n)-[r]->(m) WHERE NOT n.domain = m.domain RETURN p

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AllowedToAct]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:Owns]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AllExtendedRights]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:AddKeyCredentialLink]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:GenericAll]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:WriteDacl]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:WriteOwner]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:GenericWrite]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r:MemberOf]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY n.name

queries.name: List all privileges for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[r]->(m) RETURN p ORDER BY TYPE(r)

queries.name: List all group-delegated privileges for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name
MATCH p=(n:Computer {name: $result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group),(m)-[r]->(v) RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to high-value targets for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH (m:Computer {name: $result}),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Domain Admins for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-512" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to Enterprise Admins for this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-519" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-21-.*-516" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") return p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)EXCHANGE).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)WEB).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m:Computer {name: $result})-[r*1..]->(n:Group)) WHERE n.name =~ ".*((?i)service|svc).*" AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: List all shortest paths to this computer

queryList.title: Select source computer...
queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) RETURN c.name ORDER BY c.name

MATCH p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n:Computer {name: $result})) WHERE NOT m=n AND NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") RETURN p ORDER BY m.name

queries.name: Return All Azure Users that are part of the 'Global Administrator' Role

queryList.query: MATCH p =(n)-[r:AZGlobalAdmin*1..]->(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All On-Prem users with edges to Azure

queryList.query: MATCH  p=(m:User)-[r:AZResetPassword|AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator|AZContributor|AZAddMembers|AZGlobalAdmin|AZVMContributor|AZOwnsAZAvereContributor]->(n) WHERE m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5-21' RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure VM

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZVM) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure KeyVault

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZKeyVault) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users and their Groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZUser)-[r:MemberOf]->(n) WHERE NOT m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure AD Groups that are synchronized with On-Premise AD

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND n.azsyncid IS NOT NULL RETURN n
MATCH p = (g:AZServicePrincipal)-[r]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Owners of Azure Applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AZOwns]->(g:AZApp) RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Members of the 'Global Administrator' Role

queryList.query: MATCH p =(n)-[r:AZGlobalAdmin*1..]->(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Members of High Privileged Roles

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..2]->(r:AZRole WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|PRIVILEGED AUTHENTICATION ADMINISTRATOR') RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Members of High Privileged Roles that are synced from OnPrem AD

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n WHERE n.onpremisesyncenabled = true)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..2]->(r:AZRole WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|PRIVILEGED AUTHENTICATION ADMINISTRATOR') RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Azure Users that are synced from OnPrem AD

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZUser WHERE n.onpremisesyncenabled = true) RETURN n

queries.name: Return all Azure Groups that are synced from OnPrem AD

queryList.query: MATCH (g:AZGroup {onpremsyncenabled: True}) RETURN g

queries.name: Return all Owners of Azure Applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AZOwns]->(g:AZApp) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Azure Users with a Path to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (m:AZUser),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n RETURN p

queries.name: Find OnPrem synced Users with Paths to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (m:AZUser WHERE m.onpremisesyncenabled = true),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n RETURN p

queries.name: Find Azure Applications with Paths to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (m:AZApp),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((m)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= "GetChanges") AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r)="GetChangesAll") AND NOT m=n RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Paths to Azure VMs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZVM) RETURN p

queries.name: Find shortest Path from Owned Azure Users to VMs

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZVM) MATCH p = shortestPath((m:AZUser{owned: true})-[*..]->(n)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Paths to Azure KeyVaults

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZKeyVault) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Paths to Azure KeyVaults from Owned Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = ({owned: true})-[r]->(g:AZKeyVault) RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Service Principals with MS Graph AZMGGrantAppRoles rights -> PrivEsc Path to Global Admin

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n)-[r:AZMGGrantAppRoles]->(o:AZTenant) RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Service Principals with MS Graph App Role Assignments

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZServicePrincipal)-[r:AZMGAppRoleAssignment_ReadWrite_All|AZMGApplication_ReadWrite_All|AZMGDirectory_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroupMember_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroup_ReadWrite_All|AZMGRoleManagement_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGServicePrincipalEndpoint_ReadWrite_All]->(n:AZServicePrincipal) RETURN p

queries.name: Return all direct Controllers of MS Graph

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AZAddOwner|AZAddSecret|AZAppAdmin|AZCloudAppAdmin|AZMGAddOwner|AZMGAddSecret|AZOwns]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: "Microsoft Graph"}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find shortest Paths to MS Graph

queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE NOT n.displayname="Microsoft Graph" WITH n MATCH p = shortestPath((n)-[r*1..]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: "Microsoft Graph"})) WHERE n<>g RETURN p
MATCH (sp:AZServicePrincipal) RETURN sp

queries.name: Find all VMs with a tied Managed Identity

queryList.query: MATCH p=(:AZVM)-[:AZManagedIdentity]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Return all Azure Service Principals that are Managed Identities

queryList.query: MATCH (sp:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) RETURN sp

queries.name: Find all Azure Privileged Service Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:AZServicePrincipal)-[r]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find shortest Paths from Owned Azure Users to Azure Service Principals

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {owned: true}), (m:AZServicePrincipal) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find shortest Paths from Owned Azure Users to Azure Service Principals that are Managed Identities

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {owned: true}), (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find shortest Paths from all Azure Users to Azure Service Principals that are Managed Identities

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser), (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Service Principals that are Managed Identities an have a Path to an Azure Key Vault

queryList.query: MATCH (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'})-[*]->(kv:AZKeyVault) WITH collect(m) AS managedIdentities MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(kv:AZKeyVault) WHERE n IN managedIdentities RETURN p

queries.name: Find Paths from Managed Identities tied to a VM with a path to a Key Vault

queryList.query: MATCH p1 = (:AZVM)-[:AZManagedIdentity]->(n) WITH collect(n) AS managedIdentities MATCH p2 = (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'})-[*]->(kv:AZKeyVault) WHERE m IN managedIdentities RETURN p2

queries.name: Return all Users and Azure Users possibly related to AADConnect

queryList.query: MATCH (u) WHERE (u:User OR u:AZUser) AND (u.name =~ '(?i)^MSOL_|.*AADConnect.*' OR u.userprincipalname =~ '(?i)^sync_.*') OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:HasSession]->(s:Session) RETURN u, s

queries.name: Find all Sessions of possibly AADConnect related Accounts

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(n) WHERE (n:User OR n:AZUser) AND ((n.name =~ '(?i)^MSOL_|.*AADConnect.*') OR (n.userPrincipalName =~ '(?i)^sync_.*')) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all AADConnect Servers (extracted from the SYNC_ Account names)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZUser) WHERE n.name =~ '(?i)^SYNC_(.*?)_(.*?)@.*' WITH n, split(n.name, '_')[1] AS computerNamePattern MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.name CONTAINS computerNamePattern RETURN c

queries.name: Find shortest Paths to AADConnect Servers from Owned Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n:AZUser) WHERE n.name =~ '(?i)^SYNC_(.*?)_(.*?)@.*' WITH n, split(n.name, '_')[1] AS computerNamePattern MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.name CONTAINS computerNamePattern WITH collect(c) AS computers MATCH p = shortestPath((u:User)-[*]-(c:Computer)) WHERE c IN computers AND length(p) > 0 AND u.owned = true RETURN u, p
